(A) Evidence of Erosion: Siltation is a constant problem during heavy rains as a result of a main logging road paralleling most of this stream.
(C) Water levels: Very low water levels up to the spawning period; high water level sduring the spawning period.
(H) recommended enhancement: Some spawning bed revitalization is required on the middle reaches - a good candidate for MacMillan Bloedel/Fletcher Chall.
(I) Habitat change: Spawning beds are degrading adjacent to a major logging road.
(K) Additional comments: This stream is not listed in the Stream Summary Catalogue but should be as it supports up to 3000 chum salmon or more, as well as coho; chinooks were recorded in 1986.
